overview.title: Study Overview
overview.objective: Investigate whether visual augmentation combined with auditory frequency entrainment (6 Hz theta binaural beats) enhances memory encoding compared to traditional study methods.
overview.participants: 60 undergraduate students (M age = 22.3 years) randomly assigned to three conditions.

implementation.title: Platform Implementation
implementation.item1: Sacred Geometry Wheel: Implements 6 Hz visual entrainment with synchronized pulsing
implementation.item2: Binaural Beat Generator: Produces precise theta frequencies (4-8 Hz) for memory consolidation
implementation.item3: Multimodal Synchronization: Combines visual and auditory stimuli for maximum effect

phase3.title: Phase 3: Consolidation (Theta 4-8 Hz)
phase3.description: Memory processing during rest and sleep
phase3.duration: Duration: Pre-sleep review + full night's sleep

preSleep.title: Pre-Sleep Encoding Boost
preSleep.subtitle: 15-20 Minutes Before Bed:
preSleep.step1: Light Review (5 min): Skim key concepts without deep thinking
preSleep.step2: Theta Transition (10-15 min): Use 6 Hz theta beats, lie down, eyes closed
preSleep.step3: Mental Drift: Let concepts flow through your mind naturally
preSleep.step4: Direct to Sleep: Brain continues processing during sleep phases

mentalRehearsal.title: Enhanced Skill Acquisition Through Mental Rehearsal

dualProcess.title: Dual-Process Theory
dualProcess.description: Optimizing transition between System 1 (automatic) and System 2 (deliberate) processing

chunking.title: Chunking Theory
chunking.description: Creating efficient cognitive chunks through structured rehearsal

contextMemory.title: Context-Dependent Memory
contextMemory.description: Environmental anchors enhance recall and execution

anchorMethod.title: The Anchor Method
anchorMethod.description: Pair specific environmental cues with information to improve recall and trigger task-specific cognitive schemas.
anchorMethod.step1: Choose Anchor: Sound, action, or object (pen clicking, specific music, scent)
anchorMethod.step2: Consistent Pairing: Use same anchor during study sessions
anchorMethod.step3: Test Recall: Use anchor when remembering information
anchorMethod.step4: Application: Bring anchor to exam or performance

integration.title: Platform Integration
integration.subtitle: How This Research Enhances ShadowFang AIO:
integration.item1: Frequency Anchoring: Use specific frequencies as environmental triggers for different cognitive states
integration.item2: Visual Cues: Sacred geometry patterns serve as visual anchors for memory consolidation
integration.item3: Mental Rehearsal Protocols: Structured visualization exercises for skill automaticity
integration.item4: State-Dependent Learning: Match study and performance states for optimal recall
